Summary: looking at stars, dark shape passed over head, about 100-200ft above tree tops, no sound
divs: Sighting Details1. standing out side at small fire, in back yard 2. looking at stars, came into view 3. ufo 4. moved over trees from south to north, not very fast, was like a dark cloud, but quite small. appeared to be only 200ft above tree tops. traveled across clearing in trees for aboout 2-3 seconds, then lost sight. 5. told brother what i had seen, was a ufo by definition 6. passed across clearing in trees
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around January 1st 2000
This sighting has never been favorited.
